text: Ata'eba allah yadi ka'uke iccha karena ye tini take dharmapathe paricalana karabena, tabe tara baksa tini isalamera prati prasasta karabena, ara yara jan'ya tini iccha karena ye tini take pathabhrastataya phele rakhabena, tara baksake tini atomsamto o sankirna kare phelena yena se akase arohana kare caleche. E'ibhabe allah kalusata anayana karena tadera upare yara bisbasa sthapana kare na.
